resources.string: You must give a name to your exam. Retry!
Congratulations! What grade did you get?
You must give a valid grade. Retry!
Can\'t add a new exam with a duplicate name!

Concentration is key for getting good results in studying, just as much as being able to plan correctly every study session. However, concentration needs a rest every once in a while, especially for people who tend to get easily distracted.

 DeskTime has come up with a theory for productivity based on a 52:17 work / rest ratio which shows how the most productive people in the world thrive daily. This app applies this theory to study sessions, as one hour of uninterrupted dedication is rewarded with a 20 minute break. ItsStudyTime works also as an exam planner with unique features that allow to store, check and share exam data.

 Be productive without overworking yourself. Prepare your next exam with ItsStudyTime!
Are you sure about erasing your exams?
Add your next exams to the list and start preparing them with ItsStudyTime
Get back into studying with ItsStudyTime!
